title: Bug 120315 If the display property of an item is set to 'none', it doesn't take effect in the new PDF emitter.
OB: When the display property of an item is set to 'none' in the properties view, the label is still visible in the generated PDF.
EB: The label should disappear in the generated PDF when the display property is set to 'none'.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label.
2. Open the 'properties' view.
3. Set the sectionDisplay property to 'none'.
4. Generate the PDF and observe that the label is still visible.
